# Sample REIT Financial Statements - Q2 2025

## Balance Sheet (June 30, 2025)
All amounts in CAD thousands

| Item | Amount |
|------|--------|
| Total Assets | 1,500,000 |
| Investment Properties | 1,200,000 |
| Cash and Cash Equivalents | 25,000 |
| Total Liabilities | 800,000 |
| Mortgages Payable (Non-Current) | 250,000 |
| Mortgages Payable (Current) | 150,000 |
| Credit Facilities | 300,000 |
| Unitholders' Equity | 700,000 |

## Income Statement (Q2 2025)

| Item | Amount |
|------|--------|
| Revenue | 45,000 |
| Property Operating Expenses | 15,000 |
| Net Operating Income | 30,000 |
| Interest Expense | 12,000 |
| Net Income | 8,000 |

## FFO/AFFO Reconciliation (Q2 2025)

| Item | Amount |
|------|--------|
| Funds From Operations (FFO) | 15,000 |
| Adjusted Funds From Operations (AFFO) | 12,000 |
| FFO per Unit (Diluted) | 0.25 |
| AFFO per Unit (Diluted) | 0.20 |
| Distributions per Common Unit | 0.18 |

## Portfolio Metrics

- **Occupancy Rate:** 92.5%
- **Gross Leasable Area:** 5,000,000 sq ft
- **Same Property NOI Growth:** 3.2%
- **Number of Properties:** 50

## Management Discussion

The REIT continues to demonstrate strong operational performance with occupancy
remaining above 90% and positive same-property NOI growth.
